name: The Braves: Beginning
description:
What comes after life? A new beginning, of course! The Braves: Beginning is a free bullet hell with roguelike elements, packed with unique skills, various weapons, and hordes of enemies.

The game features:
- A rich roster of 20 characters, each with a unique design and distinct specialization.
- Fateful battles against evil in a range of arenas: Forest, Laboratory, Cemetery, and Mycelium Network.
- Lots of resources to collect, manage, and spend. Upgrade your equipment in the Forge and your characters in the Tavern.
- Awesome rewards for completing quests at City Hall.
- Fierce monsters and bosses.
- Endless combinations of diverse skills.

Test your heroes’ mettle! Travel across a ruthless fantasy world and meet the cute but ferocious monsters that inhabit it. Fight, collect resources, upgrade your gear and increase your stats. Do anything it takes to survive and claim victory!
